item.title: How to use Agit CMS
item.description: Here’s a documentation of how to use Agit CMS. The project link: https://github.com/0xsuk/agitcms Only thing you need is a static site, powered by whatever “markdown based” static site generators like Hugo, Jekyll, Next.js, Gatsby.js and so on. “markdown based” means you write contents in markdown in your local PC. Agit CMS is NOT a git based CMS, or API based CMS. It’s a desktop app for writing markdown posts. So you need ready-to-run static sites on your local PC.
